channel.title: [tut] Javac error fix
channel.description:
Hello people uhhm im Darvald and this is a tut for pps who got a javac error.. Pleas thank me if you like the TUT...
step 1. Make sure you have this error ''javac is not recognized as a internal or external command Press any key to coninue...''
step 2. make a new map in my documents called ''Mopardrive''
step 3. download these java's in the map mopardrive *http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download-netbeans.html *http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/install_jdk150-nb40beta2_windows.html .remember that both files contain Netbeans so 1 of both you cant install it and the install and download both COULD take a hour 2 hour!.
step 3.close all your webcleints and other things.
step 4. DeInstall your current using Javas..
step 5. Install the 2 java's you putted earlier in the map ''Mopardrive''
if you done this exactly like i said it has to work.. if it doesnt IDK what to do but try another source i recommed testscape or my personal favorite N0vascape...
end :)

item.title: [tut] Javac error fix
item.dc:creator: @baracuda baracuda
item.description:
@baracuda wrote:

  1. wrong sec
  2. this tut is wrong
  3. you forgot ot put the sites in hyperlinks
  4. you dont need a mopardrive
  5. all you need is those downloads

Read full topic

yes you need the map,becaus its normal you have in the map were u put al your downloads you cant find the good java becaus they all called like “5.0.09.jre-09patch” so why not making a new map…doesn’t takes lot of time…

item.title: [tut] Javac error fix
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

you dont need to map a drive… all you have to do is make sure that if you dont have JDK installed, install it, else set your path variable

item.title: [tut] Javac error fix
item.dc:creator: @darvald darvald
item.description:
@darvald wrote:

Hello people uhhm im Darvald and this is a tut for pps who got a javac error…
Pleas thank me if you like the TUT…

step 1. Make sure you have this error
‘‘javac is not recognized as a internal or external command
Press any key to coninue…’’

step 2. make a new map in my documents called ‘‘Mopardrive’’

step 3. download these java’s in the map mopardrive
*http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download-netbeans.html
*http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/install_jdk150-nb40beta2_windows.html
.remember that both files contain Netbeans so 1 of both you cant install it and the install and download both COULD take a hour 2 hour!.

step 3.close all your webcleints and other things.

step 4. DeInstall your current using Javas…

step 5. Install the 2 java’s you putted earlier in the map ‘‘Mopardrive’’

if you done this exactly like i said it has to work… if it doesnt IDK what to do but try another source i recommed testscape or my personal favorite N0vascape…

end
